Input: 이번주 우리반과 앞반의 평균 온도 알려줘

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 이번주 우리반과 앞반의 평균 실내온도를 알고싶어함. 이번주 우리반과 앞반의 실내온도를 쿼리한 후 각 반의 평균 실내온도를 계산하여 반환하면 됨.
Expectations: 이번주 우리반의 평균 실내온도는 {{이번주_우리반_실내온도_평균}}℃이고, 앞반의 평균 실내온도는 {{이번주_앞반_실내온도_평균}}℃입니다.
Script: v_이번주_우리반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 week') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

v_이번주_앞반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('02_I81')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 week') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 현재 우리반의 설정온도와 실내온도 차이를 알고 싶어함. 현재 설정온도와 실내온도값을 쿼리한 후 차이를 계산하여 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_현재_우리반_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "settemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM "data_t") ORDER BY timestamp"

Input: 지난달에 설정온도와 실내온도 차이가 가장 많이 났던 날은?

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 지난달 우리반 설정온도와 실내온도 차이가 가장 컸던 날짜를 알고 싶어함. 지난달 우리반의 설정온도와 실내온도 데이터를 쿼리한 후 차이를 계산하면 됨.
Expectations: 지난달 설정온도와 실내온도 차이가 가장 컸던 날은 {{지난달_우리반_온도차이_최고_날짜}}로 {{지난달_우리반_온도차이_최고}}℃였습니다.
Script: v_지난달_우리반_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "settemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30') - INTERVAL '1 month' AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

Input: 이번주 우리반과 옆반의 평균 실내온도 차이 알려줘

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 이번주 우리반과 옆반의 평균 실내온도를 알고 이번주 평균 실내온도 차이를 알고 싶어함. 이번주 우리반과 옆반의 실내온도를 쿼리한 후 각 반의 평균 실내온도 및 그 차이를 계산하여 반환하면 됨.
Expectations: 이번주 우리반의 평균 실내온도({{이번주_우리반_실내온도_평균}}℃)는 옆반의 평균 실내온도({{이번주_옆반_실내온도_평균}}℃)보다 {{이번주_실내온도_평균의_차이}}℃ 높습니다.
Script: v_이번주_우리반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 week') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

v_이번주_옆반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 week') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

Candidate.Thinking: 2주전은 정확히 말하면 2주전 한주 (월~일)동안임. 사용자는 2주전 한주 동안 실내온도가 최대였던 날짜를 알고 싶어함. 2주전 한주 동안 실내온도를 쿼리한 후 최대 실내온도를 기록한 날과 그 온도를 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_2주전_한주_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7', '02_I81')) AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '2 week') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 week') AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '2 week') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 week') ORDER BY timestamp"

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 화성의 현재 설정온도를 알고 싶어함. 현재 화성의 설정온도를 쿼리한 후 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_현재_화성_설정온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "settemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '02_I81')) AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM "data_t") ORDER BY timestamp"

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 옆반의 현재 습도를 알고싶어함. 현재 옆반의 습도를 쿼리한 후 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_현재_옆반_습도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "settemp", "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB7')) AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "roomtemp" = "settemp" AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM "data_t") ORDER BY timestamp"

Input: 지난 3일 동안 우리반 실내 온도 평균 값 알려줘.

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 지난 3일 우리반의 실내온도 평균을 알고싶어함. 해당 기간의 실내온도 데이터를 쿼리한 후 평균값을 계산하여 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_지난3일_우리반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '3 day') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '2 day') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 오늘 오후 5시에 옆반의 설정온도를 알고 싶어함. 해당 시간대의 설정온도 데이터를 쿼리한 후 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_오후5시_옆반_설정온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "settemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB7')) AND timestamp = DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30') + INTERVAL '17 hours' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

Input: 올해 여름 우리반 실내온도 최대값과 최소값 알려줘

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 올해 6월 ~ 8월 우리반의 실내온도 최대와 최소를 알고싶어함. 올해 여름 우리반의 실내온도 데이터를 쿼리한 후 최대와 최소 실내온도를 찾아 그 값을 반환하면 됨.
Expectations: 올해 여름 우리반 실내온도는 {{올해여름_우리반_실내온도_최대}}℃로 최대였고, {{올해여름_우리반_실내온도_최소}}℃로 최소였습니다.
Script: v_올해여름_우리반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE '2022-06-01' AND timestamp < DATE '2022-09-01' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp"

Input: 우리반과 앞반 중 가장 더운 방은?

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 현재 우리반과 앞반 중 실내온도가 높은 방을 알고싶어함. 현재 우리반과 앞반의 실내온도를 쿼리한 후 실내온도가 높은 방과 그 온도를 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_현재_우리반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM "data_t") ORDER BY timestamp"

v_현재_앞반_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('02_I81')) AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM "data_t") ORDER BY timestamp"

v_현재_실내온도_최고, v_현재_실내온도_최고_방 = max(v_현재_실내온도.values()), {'우리반': v_현재_실내온도_df['실내온도'].values[0] if v_현재_실내온도_df['실내온도'].values[0] == v_현재_실내온도_최고 else '앞반', '앞반': v_현재_앞반_실내온도_df['실내온도'].values[0] if v_현재_앞반_실내온도_df['실내온도'].values[0] == v_현재_실내온도_최고 else '우리반'}

Candidate.Thinking: 사용자는 현재 4층의 평균 실내온도를 알고싶어함. 현재 4층에 속한 모든 공간의 실내온도를 쿼리한 후 평균값을 반환하면 됨.
Script: v_현재_4층_실내온도_df = "SELECT (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "roomtemp", "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7', '02_I81')) AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM "data_t") ORDER BY timestamp"
